network_overview: Capture shows only legacy 2G/3G PS back-haul traffic: eight long-lived L2TPv2 tunnels (UDP/1701) carrying idle or keep-alive traffic, plus one GTPv2-C message (type 0x1a) with no response. No GTP-U, Diameter, SIP, RTP, or 4G/5G protocols are present.

observations.finding: All eight top flows are L2TP (UDP/1701) with identical 32-packet/1.5 kB pattern over ~15 min, indicating idle tunnel keep-alive traffic.
Single GTPv2-C message type 0x1a (Echo Request) sent at 1660756057.642 with TEID 0x00000000; zero reply observed.
No GTP-U tunnels established (unique TEIDs = 0) despite GTPv2-C presence.

root_causes.description: One GTPv2-C Echo Request (type 0x1a) was transmitted but no Echo Response arrived within the capture window, indicating the peer path or process is unreachable or disabled.
root_causes.impact: Path validation between 10.47.81.138 and 10.47.81.124 fails; potential CP node isolation.

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No GTP-U Create Session Request/Response or TEID allocation observed.
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture on S11/S5/S8 interfaces during attach procedure

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No SIP, RTP, or Diameter messages present.
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture on P-CSCF/SBC interfaces or SGi for RTP

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No Diameter S6a, Cx, or MAP messages observed.
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture on MME-HSS (S6a) or I-CSCF-HSS (Cx) links

recommendations.action: Investigate why GTPv2-C Echo Request to 10.47.81.124 is unanswered (firewall, process down, or routing).
recommendations.rationale: Unanswered echo indicates control-plane path failure that will block bearer creation.

recommendations.action: Verify GTP-U encapsulation is enabled on monitored links; capture again during UE attach.
recommendations.rationale: Absence of GTP-U may mean monitoring point is downstream of GTP termination or attach never attempted.

session_analysis.signaling_health: Only one GTPv2-C Echo Request observed; no response implies unhealthy CP path.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U bearers detected; observed traffic is legacy L2TP idle keep-alives.
session_analysis.voice_quality: Not observable at this capture point.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: No correlation possible: no GTP-U tunnels mapped to GTPv2-C sessions.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant A as 10.47.81.138
    participant B as 10.47.81.124
    A->>B: GTPv2-C Echo Request (0x1a)
    Note over B: No Echo Response seen
